entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming west 20 after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 30 early in the evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
